patthana7.22:4.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana7.22:4.2: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana7.22:4.3: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana7.22:4.4: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho ca naanidassanaappaṭigho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana7.22:4.5: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naanidassanasappaṭigho ca naanidassanaappaṭigho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana7.22:4.6: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho ca naanidassanasappaṭigho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. #6

patthana7.22:5.2: Naanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana7.22:5.3: Naanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana7.22:5.4: Naanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho ca naanidassanaappaṭigho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana7.22:5.5: Naanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naanidassanasappaṭigho ca naanidassanaappaṭigho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana7.22:5.6: Naanidassanasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho ca naanidassanasappaṭigho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. #6
patthana7.22:6.1: Naanidassanaappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana7.22:6.2: Naanidassanaappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana7.22:6.3: Naanidassanaappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā ….
patthana7.22:7.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighañca naanidassanaappaṭighañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā ….
patthana7.22:8.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighañca naanidassanasappaṭighañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā ….
patthana7.22:9.1: Hetuyā tiṃsa, ārammaṇe nava … pe … aññamaññe pañcavīsa … pe … avigate tiṃsa.
patthana7.22:10.1: (Yathā kusalattike sahajātavārampi paccayavārampi nissayavārampi saṃsaṭṭhavārampi sampayuttavārampi pañhāvārampi gaṇitaṃ evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.)
